select.sql: select u.UserID, concat('',u.Login,'') User, t.Name Post,t.Weight Weight, concat(round(100*t.Weight/(select sum(t1.Weight) from ut_users u1 join gd_posts p1 on u1.UserID=p1.UserID join gd_post_types t1 on t1.TypeID=p1.TypeID where u1.GuildID='$auth->guild;'),2),'%') as Percent from ut_users u left outer join gd_posts p on p.UserID=u.UserID left outer join gd_post_types t on p.TypeID=t.TypeID where u.GuildID='$auth->guild;' and u.GuildStatusID=1

update.sql: set @error=if(unix_timestamp()-(select coalesce(Date,0) from gd_posts where UserID=@id;)<86400,'Нельзя менять должность чаще чем раз в день','') #insert into gd_posts(Date,TypeID,UserID,GuildID) values(unix_timestamp(),@TypeID;,@id;,'$auth->guild;') on duplicate key update Date=unix_timestamp(),TypeID=@TypeID,GuildID='$auth->guild;'
update.select: select u.*,p.TypeID from ut_users u left outer join gd_posts p on p.UserID=u.UserID where u.UserID=@id;

field.name: TypeID
field.sql: select TypeID,Name from gd_post_types where GuildID='$auth->guild;' order by Name

delete.sql: set @error=if(@id;=(select UserID from gd_guilds where GuildID='$auth->guild;'),'Нельзя удалить администратора','') #update ut_users set GuildStatusID=0,GuildID=0 where UserID=@id; and GuildID='$auth->guild;' #update gd_guilds set NumMembers=NumMembers-1 where GuildID='$auth->guild;'
